alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:17AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 930 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near White Oak Park. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, Water over lowest portions of Goos Ferry Road. Cars should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:35 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 0.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to 3.5 feet early Friday afternoon. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 2.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River White Oak Park 2.0 0.2 Tue 8 am CST 0.8 2.7 3.5 &&
